desc: 225% boost to Atk, 100% boost to max HP and 30% boost to critical hit rate of Thunder types, hugely boosts critical damage, critical damage enormously boosts BB gauge for 3 turns & enormously boosts Thunder elemental damage. 25% boost to all parameters of Thunder types and 20% damage reduction from Water, Thunder types for all allies in Guild Raid
name: Unyielding Defiance
